sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.plugin

Class Activator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.core.runtime.Plugin
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.eclipse.core.runtime.ExtendedPlugin
        • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.plugin.Activator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator

    public final class Activator
extends ExtendedPlugin
    The Activator class controls the plug-in life cycle.

    Warning: Users should not explicitly instantiate this class.

    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

      • loadServices

        public static void loadServices(java.lang.Runnable hook,
                                long timeout,
                                java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
                         throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Processes supplied extensions, loads and starts core services.
        Parameters:
        action - executed after services load prior to start, not null
        timeout - the maximum time to load
        unit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurred
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the load timed out

      • loadServices

        public static void unloadServices(java.lang.Runnable hook,
                                  long timeout,
                                  java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
                           throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Processes supplied extensions, stops and unloads core services.
        Parameters:
        action - executed after services stop prior to unload, not null
        timeout - the maximum time to unload
        unit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurred
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if the unload timed out
